title: Does platinum music artist Pitbull own pitbulls? - Quora

response.answer_text: No. The rapper Pitbull does not own pitbull dogs. Born Armando Christian Perez, said he chose his stage name “Pitbull” because the dogs “bite to lock”. The dog is too stupid to lose. And they're outlawed in a Dade County, where he’s from. They're basically everything I am. It’s a constant fight. After meeting Lil John in Miami, Pitbull was featured on Lil John and the East Sude Boyz’ album Kings of Crunk in 2002. Pitbull’s song “Oye” was featured on the soundtrack to the film 2 Fast 2 Furious the following year. In addition, Pitbull released several mix tapes, composed of freestyles and remixes of popular rap music.
